publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-93 Tavish Scott: Cutty Sark Tallships Race in Lerwick— That the Parliament congratulates Sail Shetland; Lerwick Port Authority; the sponsors; Balta-sail, and all involved in Shetland’s hosting of the Cutty Sark Tall Ships’ Race in Lerwick between 9-12 August; notes that the event was a showcase for Shetland’s indigenous industries: seafood; agriculture; knitwear; crafts; tourism, and for the exceptional abilities of Shetland’s musicians; and recognises that above all the event was a magnificent illustration of how a small island community can work together to present a positive, exciting and vibrant event to the outside world.

S1M-93 Tavish Scott: Cutty Sark Tall Ships Race in Lerwick—That the Parliament congratulates Sail Shetland; Lerwick Port Authority; the sponsors; Balta-sail, and all involved in Shetland’s hosting of the Cutty Sark Tall Ships’ Race in Lerwick between 9-12 August; notes that the event was a showcase for Shetland’s indigenous industries: seafood; agriculture; knitwear; crafts; tourism, and for the exceptional abilities of Shetland’s musicians; and recognises that above all the event was a magnificent illustration of how a small island community can work together to present a positive, exciting and vibrant event to the outside world. (lodged on 16 August)

S1M-93 Tavish Scott: Cutty Sark Tall Ships Race in Lerwick—That the Parliament congratulates Sail Shetland; Lerwick Port Authority; the sponsors; Balta-sail, and all involved in Shetland’s hosting of the Cutty Sark Tall Ships’ Race in Lerwick between 9-12 August; notes that the event was a showcase for Shetland’s indigenous industries: seafood; agriculture; knitwear; crafts; tourism, and for the exceptional abilities of Shetland’s musicians; and recognises that above all the event was a magnificent illustration of how a small island community can work together to present a positive, exciting and vibrantt event to the outside world.

S1M-93 Tavish Scott: Cutty Sark Tall Ships Race in Lerwick—That the Parliament congratulates Sail Shetland; Lerwick Port Authority; the sponsors; Balta-sail, and all involved in Shetland’s hosting of the Cutty Sark Tall Ships’ Race in Lerwick between 9-12 August; notes that the event was a showcase for Shetland’s indigenous industries: seafood; agriculture; knitwear; crafts; tourism, and for the exceptional abilities of Shetland’s musicians; and recognises that above all the event was a magnificent illustration of how a small island community can work together to present a positive, exciting and vibrant event to the outside world.
S1M-93 Cutty Sark Tall Ships Race in Lerwick (lodged on 16 August 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-93 Cutty Sark Tall Ships Race in Lerwick (lodged on 16 August 1999) Mrs Margaret Smith*

S1M-93 Tavish Scott: Cutty Sark Tall Ships Race in Lerwick—That the Parliament congratulates Sail Shetland; Lerwick Port Authority; the sponsors; Balta-sail, and all involved in Shetland’s hosting of the Cutty Sark Tall Ships’ Race in Lerwick between 9-12 August; notes that the event was a showcase for Shetland’s indigenous industries: seafood; agriculture; knitwear; crafts; tourism, and for the exceptional abilities of Shetland’s musicians; and recognises that above all the event was a magnificent illustration of how a small island community can work together to present a positive, exciting and vibrant event to the outside world. Supported by: Dr Winnie Ewing, Mrs Margaret Smith
